name: Jump Puzzle
description:
A platform jumping puzzle game,
Reasonable use of various abilities of different animals,
Keep the unicorn from falling into the abyss,
Find your way home.

Simple game operation, just choose the direction and jump
Rich game experience, plots with different functions constitute unique levels

Sometimes some plots are needed, move or rotate it.
Sometimes some plots are not needed, break or move it
Sometimes different heights are required, ascend or descend it
It even sometimes requires bumping to solve puzzles

And all it takes is choosing a direction, jumping.
In short, simple operation and extreme thinking are the core of the game
